overview: The Satyagraha (from Sanskrit सत्याग्रह) or embrace the truth "(satya = truth agraha = seizure) is the principle of non-violence civil disobedience that Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi was introduced. What happened to the values of Gandhi today? What world do we want to build. Se film does not lecture, he does not explain, it opens a space to slip and sensitive issue.
title: Satyagraha
